Steps.Message: Update at 09:34 - It's Aaron from the text messaging team and I'm pleased to inform you that we believe our engineers have been able to restore power to all customers in the Westgate Road area, by diverting power around the underground network fault whilst the repairs continue. Please accept our sincere apology as we know that it is difficult to be without power for a longer duration. If your power isn't back on we'll need to hear from you. To report this, or to talk to us about anything else, call us on 08003163105 which is free from landlines and mobiles. We're really sorry for any disruption this caused.

We became aware of a power cut at 22:52. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Steps.Message: All power in the area should be back on. We’re really sorry for any disruption this caused.
Steps.Name: Power restored

Logs.Comment: Update at 09:34 - It's Aaron from the text messaging team and I'm pleased to inform you that we believe our engineers have been able to restore power to all customers in the Westgate Road area, by diverting power around the underground network fault whilst the repairs continue. Please accept our sincere apology as we know that it is difficult to be without power for a longer duration. If your power isn't back on we'll need to hear from you. To report this, or to talk to us about anything else, call us on 08003163105 which is free from landlines and mobiles. We're really sorry for any disruption this caused.

UKPNIncident.PlannedIncidentReason: We're carrying out planned work in your area. For our engineers to carry it out safely they need to turn the power off. We're doing this work as it's essential to provide reliable electricity supplies to your area. We're sorry for any inconvenience caused and thank you for your patience.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
